info.title: Brightness

light.brightness.description: This Resource describes the brightness of a light or lamp. The Property "brightness" is an integer showing the current brightness level as a quantized representation in the range 0-100. A brightness of 0 is the minimum for the resource. A brightness of 100 is the maximum for the resource.

brightness.description: The Quantized representation in the range 0-100 of the current sensed or set value for Brightness.
